editor.guides.highlight-active-indentati.name: highlight-active-indentation
editor.guides.highlight-active-indentati.description: Enable highlighting of the active indent guide.

editor.font-size.name: font-size
editor.font-size.description: Font size of code in the editor.

console.show-completions.name: show-completions
console.show-completions.description: How much detail should completions provide.

editor.auto-indent.name: auto-indent
editor.auto-indent.description:
Controls whether the editor should automatically
 adjust the indentation when users type, paste, move or indent lines.

editor.font.name: font
editor.font.description:
Font to use in the editor.

 Comma-delimited list like "FiraMono,mono"

editor.guides.bracket-pairs-horizontal.name: bracket-pairs-horizontal
editor.guides.bracket-pairs-horizontal.description: Enable rendering of vertical bracket pair guides.

editor.guides.highlight-active-bracket-p.name: highlight-active-bracket-pair
editor.guides.highlight-active-bracket-p.description: Enable highlighting of the active bracket pair.

editor.font-ligatures.name: font-ligatures
editor.font-ligatures.description: Render font ligatures in the code editor.

editor.cursor-style.name: cursor-style
editor.cursor-style.description: Style of the cursor in the code editor.

editor.minimap.name: minimap
editor.minimap.description: Whether to show a minimap in the top-right of the code editor.

editor.guides.bracket-pairs.name: bracket-pairs
editor.guides.bracket-pairs.description: Enable rendering of bracket pair guides.

editor.line-numbers.name: line-numbers
editor.line-numbers.description: How line numbers appear in the code editor.

workspace.handle-size.name: handle-size
workspace.handle-size.description: The size of the pane drag handle.

editor.word-wrap.name: word-wrap
editor.word-wrap.description: Whether to wrap lines in the code editor.

editor.scroll-beyond-last-line.name: scroll-beyond-last-line
editor.scroll-beyond-last-line.description: Enable scrolling to go one screen size past the last line.

console.wrap.name: wrap
console.wrap.description:
True: Wrap console messages. May scramble certain error messages.
 False: Console messages overflow past the size of the viewport.

editor.cursor-blinking.name: cursor-blinking
editor.cursor-blinking.description: Controls the cursor animation style in the code editor.

editor.smooth-scrolling.name: smooth-scrolling
editor.smooth-scrolling.description: Animate smooth scrolling in the editor.
